rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious north-facing entrance hall that sets the tone for the Art Deco theme with ornate detailing and a welcoming atmosphere.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living area with Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and elegant fixtures. It overlooks the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen with minimalistic design and a nod to Vastu principles by maintaining proper ventilation and light flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen designed with functionality in mind. The layout follows the north entrance concept with efficient workflow and ample storage.

openings.description: Large windows for abundant natural light, enhancing both energy efficiency and Vastu compliance.
Accessible opening leading to a two-car garage situated on the east side of the property.

courtyard.description: A central courtyard serving as both an aesthetic focal point and functional space for outdoor relaxation, ensuring adherence to Vastu principles with proper alignment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed in Art Deco style featuring vintage accents and ample natural lighting via north-facing windows.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable secondary bedroom with a Vastu-compliant layout ensuring privacy and balance.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Well-proportioned bedroom that complements the overall design aesthetic of the townhouse.

rooms.name: Bathroom Suite
rooms.description: Modern bathroom suite with Art Deco finishes and functional layout that promotes good Vastu energy flow.

openings.description: Small balconies in each bedroom to provide outdoor access while maintaining privacy and natural light.
